item.title: Asia Atlantic Airlines will provide SmartTray tables for passengers to use with their mobile devices
item.description:
Asia Atlantic Airlines will soon be outfitting their planes with SmartTray X1 tray tables, designed to make using electronic devices easier for passengers. The new tray tables feature a groove specifically for holding tablets, e-readers, and smartphones. These trays will be available to passengers flying in the premium economy cabin of Asia Atlantic Airlines’ Boeing 767-300ER aircraft. Source: SmartTray International. Bobby Haque, President of Asia Atlantic Airlines, believes these trays will improve the travel experience...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/asia-atlantic-airlines-will-provide-smarttray-tables-for-passengers-to-use-with-their-mobile-devices/
